title: Paris Blues (1961) DVDRip, Subs English + Nordic
description:
PARIS BLUES (1961)

Ram Bowen and Eddie Cook are two expatriate jazz musicians 
living in Paris where, unlike America at the time, Jazz 
musicians are celebrated and racism is a non-issue. When 
they meet and fall in love with two young American girls, 
Lillian and Connie, who are vacationing in France, Ram and 
Eddie must decide whether they should move back to America 
with them, or stay in Paris for the freedom it allows them. 
Ram, who wants to be a serious composer, finds Paris more 
exciting than America and is reluctant to give up his music 
for a relationship, and Eddie wants to stay for the city's 
more tolerant racial atmosphere.
